Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardPile
      • Deck

  • public class Deck
extends CardPile

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      This constructor creates 52 playing cards, with ranks from Ace to King and suits from Spades to Diamonds, and then adds them to the Deck.
      Deck(Deck other)
      This copy constructor accepts another Deck object as an argument.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shuffle()
      The shuffle method randomly shuffles all of the cards in the Deck.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        This constructor creates 52 playing cards, with ranks from Ace to King and suits from Spades to Diamonds, and then adds them to the Deck.

      • Deck

        public Deck(Deck other)
        This copy constructor accepts another Deck object as an argument. It then creates a card for each card in it, and adds them to the new Deck object.
        Parameters:
        other - The Deck object to be copied.

    • Method Detail

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        The shuffle method randomly shuffles all of the cards in the Deck.
